title: Halloween Watch Face

descriptionHTML:
Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Halloween Watch Face is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.
Scary pumpkin is waiting to animate your device screen. Don't be afraid, our pumpkin is friendly. Download now Halloween Watch Face and have fun.
How to setup Halloween Watch Face:
★ Install Android Wear first!
★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.
★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Halloween Watch Face.
★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.
★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!
We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered!
Features:
★ Designed by professional artists !
★ Battery friendly !
★ Easy installing process
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Analog display
★ New beautiful themes every day !!!
You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Halloween Watch Face app settings menu.
Halloween Watch Face is compatible with:
★ ASUS ZENWATCH
★ LG G WATCH R
★ MOTO 360
★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3
★ LG G WATCH
★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!
★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!


Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! Also, if you have any suggestions on how we can improve your experience or if you would like to see a particular watch face with some specific design please write us at the e-mail address: watchfacebytme@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important for us.
comments: Fun for the holidays The hands could be a little bolder.  I have trouble seeing the time. (Odd thing is, the second hand is more visible than the hour or minute hand)
Really Bad On a watch with an AMOLED screen like the Asus Zenwatch, the hands disappear into a confusing mess in dim mode. That makes it pretty much useless. Unfortunate.
Festive, but... Can hardly read the time in ambient mode with everything white & the hands being so thin.
Needs work. Great design and idea but sadly off centre with bottom half missing on my moto 360, but hey, it was free so can't knock it.
Incorrect time Love the face but shows wrong time?
LG G watch.  Works fine but the hands are so thin it is very hard to tell the time, cannot see the hour hand at all on the black and white image.
recentChanges: Updated to support Moto 360 ambidextrous feature.
